Node.js Hackday: Creepagram from Hack The Planet on Vimeo.

Matt Smith and Jon Sullivan of Mindflash present their idea of combining Instagram photos and Google Street views to make Creepagram.

Node.js Hackday was held on February 29, 2012 at Rackspace SF.
